mapper.select: select s.*, r.* from seat s left join SEATROOM r on s.seat_num = r.seat_num where r.seat_end_early is null order by s.seat_num
mapper.insert: insert into SEATROOM(SEAT_PICK_NUM,USER_ID,SEAT_NUM,SEAT_START_TIME,SEAT_END_TIME,SEAT_END_EARLY) values(seat_pick_seq.nextval, #{user_Id}, #{seat_Num}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE + (interval '3' hour), null)
